name: Slidey Painty
description:
Game from Game Studio I made as a team

The original concept for Slidey-Painty is for two players to take control of painting robots in a top down arena, competing to see who can paint the most of the floor in a set amount of time. The initial idea for this concept was a fast paced and head to head experience in which players are able to quickly grasp the main concepts of the game but might take many rounds of the game to truly master.
